title: kandanai marandoru
sahitya:
kandanai marandoru cintanai edarkku kavalaik-kaDal vizhunda manamE unakku


anupallavi

  nandanai vAzvitta nAyakan maganai nambiyin tirumagaL nAyakan guhanai


caraNam    aruL viLangum nalla arupaDai vITTilum poruL viLangum tamizhp-pAvalar pATTilum
iruL vilakkum tiruviLakkena viLangum iraivanai vaNangiDat-toTTadu tulangum
